about_the_game:
Experience the sounds of Pinnacle City no matter where you are. This exciting soundtrack by Kunal Majmudar also features original compositions from "Secret of Mana" and "Soukaigi" composer Hiroki Kikuta. From sweeping square waves to crushed bit beats, this soundtrack's soundscape creates a world beyond your keyboard and mouse. Slip on some headphones and solve the case.

credits
released January 18, 2024

All music composed by Kunal Majmudar except tracks 23, 36, 44, 45, and 46 composed by Hiroki Kikuta, and track 59 composed by Mustin.
